name: Monocle
description:
Made in 48 hours for the 2020 United Game Jam with the theme of "Two."

Swap between your two vision options with the '1' and '2' keys. Pressing '1' allows you to see the blue platforms, while '2' reveals the dangerous red spikes. Pass through the four platforming levels before taking on the final boss, a pair of eyes. Make sure you know where both your enemies and platforms are at all times, because what you can't see... can hurt you!

Controls:

Arrow keys or WASD to move, 1 and 2  or O and P to switch between views,  press the up arrow while in the air to double jump and press down while in the air to fast fall

Not working in your browser? Try a different browser or download the game

Resources:

Godot (Programming)

Bosca Ceoil (Music)

Google Drawings (Art)
